author: mrglavas
msg: If an instance document contains many errors we could be spending a great deal of time
resizing the vector which stores error codes.  Allow this vector to manage its size better.
Also, we only read the vector when we're augmenting PSVI so we can avoid the
addElement calls if this feature is off.

author: ankitp
msg: allow imports of multiple schema docs. under the same namespace to be resolved.
By default, the value is 'false' so the original Xerces behaviour is preserved.

author: sandygao
msg: The pattern for "integer" type was different from what schema 2E says.
